ID Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  ID Center      ID Center   Main Menu    Identification Cards           Get an i-card    Lost Card or Stolen Card    Fees    UINs    Visitor Cards    Name Badges         Dragon Dollar$ and Flames Fare           Using Dragon Dollar$ and Flames Fare    Purchase Locations & Fees    Terms & Conditions    Meal Plans    Add Dragon Dollar$ and Flames Fare Online         CTA U-PASS           U-PASS Alternate Pickup    Troubleshoot U-Pass    About U-PASS    Eligibility    History    U-PASS @ CTA Website    U-Pass FAQ’s         FAQ           Identification Cards FAQ    Dragon Dollar$ & Meal Plans FAQ’s    U-Pass FAQ’s          Eyebrow menu    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   ID Center    FAQ    Dragon Dollar$ & Meal Plans FAQ’s        Dragon Dollar$ & Meal Plans FAQ’s  Dragon Dollar$ & Meal Plans FAQ’s  What happens to Dragon Dollar$ at the end of the semester?  Your Dragon Dollar$ stay with you while you are a current student‚ faculty or staff member at UIC. Dragon Dollar$ are not transferable or refunded at the end of any school year.    Where can I find information on dining halls‚ nutrition information‚ and menus?  Visit the UIC Dining website link: http://www.dining.uic.edu          FAQ           Identification Cards FAQ    Dragon Dollar$ & Meal Plans FAQ’s    U-Pass FAQ’s
